text: Pinnar nam atiyarkalil nam evarkalait terntetuttomo, avarkalai avvetattirku varicakkinom; anal avarkaliliruntu tamakkut tame aniyayam ceytu kontavarkalum untu, avarkaliliruntu natunilaiya natantu kontavarkalum untu, innum avarkaliliruntu, allahvi; na anumati kontu nanmaikal ceyvatil muntik kontavarkalum untu. Ituve maperum pakkiyamakum
